properties.description: The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: backup_collector_id
properties.description: (Optional) The Id of the failover Collector configured for this Collector

properties.name: collector_group_id
properties.description: (Optional) The Id of the group the Collector is in

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) The Collector's description

properties.name: enable_failback
properties.description: (Optional) Whether or not automatic failback is enabled for the Collector

properties.name: enable_collector_device_failover
properties.description: (Optional) Whether or not the device the Collector is installed on is enabled for fail over

properties.name: escalation_chain_id
properties.description: (Optional) The Id of the escalation chain associated with this Collector

properties.name: resend_interval
properties.description: (Optional) The interval, in minutes, after which alert notifications for the Collector will be resent

properties.name: suppress_alert_clear
properties.description: (Optional) Whether alert clear notifications are suppressed for the Collector
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) Name of collector group

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) Set description of collector group
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: ip_addr
properties.description: (Required) Ip Address/Hostname of device

properties.name: collector
properties.description: (required) The id of the collector that will monitoring the device

properties.name: display_name
properties.description: (Optional) Display name of device, (default is ip_addr)

properties.name: disable_alerting
properties.description: (Optional) The host is created with alerting disabled (default is true)

properties.name: hostgroup_id
properties.description: (Optional) The host group id that specifies which group the device belongs to (multiple host group ids can be added, represented by a comma separated string)

properties.name: properties
properties.description: (Optional) The properties associated with this device group. Any string value pair will work (see example).
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) Name of device group

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) Description of device group

properties.name: parent_id
properties.description: (Optional) The id of the parent group for this device group (the root device group has an Id of 1)

properties.name: applies_to
properties.description: (Optional) The Applies to custom query for this group. Setting this field will make this a dynamic group.

properties.name: disable_alerting
properties.description: (Optional) Indicates whether alerting is disabled (true) or enabled (false) for this device group

properties.name: properties
properties.description: (Optional) The properties associated with this device group. Any string value pair will work (see example).
